vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.CashOut (patch_4.sol#20-29):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_4.sol#24-27)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_4.sol#25)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.CashOut (patch_4.sol#20-29):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_4.sol#24-27)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_4.sol#26)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_4.sol#24-27)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reentrancyLock (patch_4.sol#28)
